/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, a large billboard stands tall, adding another layer of depth to the image.
